question: What is the name of the nation-wide database of health-care workers and volunteers, recently created by the Centre?
explanation:
The Government of India has recently launched a nationwide database of healthcare professionals and volunteers named ‘Covid warriors’.
The database is aimed at efficiently managing the available human resources to tackle the outbreak of Covid-19 pandemic. The state and district wise availability of human resources along with the contact details of the nodal officers are made available in the database, which can be accessed by all states and Union territories.
